individual channel basis or for the collective system of channels:
(a) do the channels hold legitimacy by providing appropriate accountability for their fair
conduct and building stakeholder trust?
(b) are the channels known and accessible to stakeholders?
(c) do the channels have clear and known procedures, set timeframes and clarity on the
processes?
(d) do the channels ensure reasonable access to sources of information, advice and
expertise?
